name: Saving Estapia: Mental Health During Pandemic
name_original: Saving Estapia: Mental Health During Pandemic
description:
Saving Estsapia is a 3D isometric game where the player is a wizard conjuring different spells to defeat dark monsters in order to save Estapia and throughout the journey learn some heavy and valuable lessons along the way.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After playing the game, please answer the survey, Thank you!: https://forms.gle/HN9VuaPXohxdnKd27
